Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='LV00B')

BibliographicData.Title: Corticocortical connections of visual, sensorimotor, and multimodal processing areas in the parietal lobe of the macaque monkey

Animals.Comments: There are no specific animal numbers for individual tracing methods, but in the whole study 11 monkeys (6 female and 5 male) were used.

"Figure 7 illustrates label resulting from a relatively small FB injection (blue) centered within area LIPv, located 2-3mm posterior to the VIPl injection of case B (cf. Fig. 7F), ... ." p. 122
"Figure 8 shows a FB injection core (blue) that was located within LIPv, though the injection halo extended into layers 1 and 2 of the transition region between LIPv and VIP." p. 123

"Case E involved a pair of tracer injections centered in area MT, as illustrated in Figure 10. The FB injection was restricted to posterior portions of MT (peripheral visual field representation, mainly lower field)... ." p. 128

Animals.Comments: There are no specific animal numbers for individual tracing methods, but in the whole study 11 monkeys (6 female and 5 male) were used.

Reference.Quotation: "The injection core was centered in the medial portion of VIP (VIPm), and the injection halo extended into supragranular layers of lateral portion of VIP (VIPl), ... ." p. 116

"Figures 4 and 5 illustrate the pattern of lable resulting from a relatively large DY injection centered in lateral portions of VIP (VIPl). The core was centered near the fundus of the IPS in supragranular layers, ... . Though the injection core was restricted to VIP, a portion of the halo was present in the transition region between VIPl and LIPv, and to a minor degree along the injection track through LIPv." p. 122
"Figure 6 illustrates a DY injection that was located along the fundus of the IPS, near the estimated anterior border of VIP (and/or the transition region between VIP and AIP)." p. 122

"Figure 8 also shows reslts from a DY injection (green) that included areas LIPd plus cortex within the outline of 7a and 7b, revealing a pattern of label largely consistent with earlier studies... ." p. 123

"Case E involved a pair of tracer injections centered in area MT, as illustrated in Figure 10. The FB injection was restricted to posterior portions of MT (peripheral visual field representation, mainly lower field); the nearby DY injection included an even more peripheral representation in MT and probably encroached into zone MSTdp." p. 128

TracerSubstance.FullName: Horseradish peroxidase, conjugated to wheat germ agglutinin

Animals.Comments: There are no specific animal numbers for individual tracing methods, but in the whole study 11 monkeys (6 female and 5 male) were used.

Reference.Quotation: "The AG injection in case A (Fig. 9; red) was centered in the newly defined architectonic zone MSTdp." p. 128

"... and a triplet of AG injections (red) in area 7b."
Reference.Comments: There were three injections with a volume of 140-190 nl in area 7b.
